name: Archetype - Sage Advice - Robusto
additionalNotes: Archetype Sage Advice premium cigars represent the archetypical Hero receiving some helpful knowledge or tool from a wise Sage that will aid the Hero on their journey. This is depicted with a rich and complex medium-full bodied smoke that presents a tapestry of sweet and zesty spice, coffee, leather, dried fruit, and cinnamon notes that explode on the palate. These flavors are created by a wise blend of aged Multination long fillers deftly bunched in a Dominican San Vicente binder and completed by a top-shelf Habano hybrid wrapper leaf. Crafted by the famous Davidoff company at their Dominican factory in three sizes
